book.synopsis: This epic tale of the north is a vibrant moral fable for our time. Set in the near future in the fishing village of Kuinak, Alaska, a remnant outpost of the American frontier not yet completely overcome by environmental havoc and mad-dog development, Sailor Song is a wild, rollicking novel, a dark and cosmic romp. The town and its denizens\x97colorful refugees from the Lower Forty-Eight and DEAPs (Descendants of Early Aboriginal Peoples)\x97are seduced and besieged by a Hollywood crew, come to film the classic children
